exact_source: Helix Resources can spend $2.8 million to earn an 80% interest in EL9511 in three stages... Minimum commitments include geophysics and 700m of drilling within 12 months. (Total A$2.8M * 0.70 USD/AUD = USD 1,960,000. The 700m drilling, USD 140,000, is part of the Stage 1 A$0.8M spend).
